name: thirdshift-menu-generator
description: ThirdShift AI-Powered Menu Generator Lambda Function

scripts.package: npm run build && cp -r node_modules dist/ && cd dist && zip -r ../menu-generator.zip .
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name thirdshift-dev-menu-generator --zip-file fileb://menu-generator.zip --region us-west-2
